document.full_text: some u.s. airwaves used for free, over-the-air tv signals must be repurposed for mobile broadband use to tackle a looming spectrum crisis, the top u.s. communications regulator said on tuesday.
document.title: tv airwaves needed to counter wireless crunch: fcc
lines_and_colors: some u.s. airwaves used for free, over-the-air tv signals must be repurposed for mobile broadband use to tackle a looming spectrum crisis, the top u.s. communications regulator said on tuesday.
